title: Duke Ravengard's Longsword
content:
this weapon type unlocks:

Cradling his newborn son awkwardly, the Duke's face pulled into a rictus of misery. His love Francesca smiled at him, briefly, and died. He stared at her until the boy cried, and he told the boy it would be all right, though he himself did not believe it.

Longsword Versatile

Duke Ravengard's Longsword is one of the Longsword Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. Duke Ravengard's Longsword is a complex blade that adds hit points to your allies when you kill an enemy, it also g
